person_analysis.overview: Alexei Schiopu is the Founder & CEO of VAWN, a construction tech startup focused on automating pre-construction estimating. Previously, he held senior leadership roles at Pallet and Lattice and spent nearly a decade scaling PlanGrid from its earliest days to Autodesk’s acquisition. With a background in electrical engineering from the University of Waterloo, Alexei combines technical expertise with startup leadership to tackle high-impact problems in construction and logistics.
person_analysis.executive_summary: From apprentice electrician to early PlanGrid employee to founder of VAWN, Alexei Schiopu brings a rare blend of technical, operational, and leadership experience. His career reflects a consistent focus on scaling high-growth companies in construction and logistics, with proven results in ARR growth, acquisitions, and fundraising.
key_insights: Entrepreneurial leader with deep experience in scaling engineering organizations
Brings construction industry credibility from nearly a decade at PlanGrid
Focuses on operational excellence and product-market fit in high-stakes industries
Has successfully transitioned from engineering execution to executive leadership
